			<I>Name of our sync tool</I>

	<TR VALIGN=TOP>

	</TR>
	<TR VALIGN=TOP>
		<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH=80>
			<B>SyncProfile</B>

	<TR VALIGN=TOP>
		<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH=80>
			<B>FileUnit</B>
		</TD>
		<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH=200>
			<I>Abstract representation of a file or folder, contains
			information such as name, size, hash code, last modified date,
			etc.</I>
		</TD>
	</TR>
	<TR VALIGN=TOP>
		<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH=80>
			<B>PlugSync</B>
		</TD>
		<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH=200>
			<I>A feature in our program. Program will run by itself while

		</TD>

	<TR VALIGN=TOP>
		<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH=80>
			<B>1 way sync</B>
		</TD>
		<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH=200>

		</TD>
	</TR>
	<TR VALIGN=TOP>
		<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH=80>
			<B>2 ways sync</B>
		</TD>
		<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH=200>
			<I>Update source and destination directories to have the same
			state</I>
		</TD>
	</TR>
	<TR VALIGN=TOP>
		<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH=80>
			<B>Report/Logger</B>
		</TD>
		<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH=200>

		</TD>
	</TR>
	<TR VALIGN=TOP>
		<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH=80>

		</TD>

	</TR>
	<TR VALIGN=TOP>
		<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH=80>

		<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH=80>
